short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transports browser to the magical world of Harry Potter, where magic and adventure await at every turn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The scene is vividly designed with the majestic Hogwarts castle perched atop a hill, showcasing its tall towers and warm light spilling from the windows. The sky is dramatic, filled with swirling clouds, adding to the mystical atmosphere. Scattered throughout the space are glowing lanterns, their lights shimmering on the surface of a nearby lake, creating an enchanting ambiance.

Some useful features:
- Notepad
- ToDo
- Links
- Apps
- History
- Bookmarks
- Downloads
- Search box
- Clock
